A light and fluffy vanilla cake, the classic birthday cake with sprinkles is simple, but rich in flavor from the vanilla notes. Vanilla is spongy and white and is often the basis of many cakes for various celebrations. It is filled with a rich, buttercream filling.

Common Toppings on Vanilla cake are:
  • coconut shavings
  • cream cheese frosting
  • chocolate shavings
  • strawberrries
  • rasberrries
